sentences.sContent: The company has identified 60 potential customers.
sentences.sCn: 该公司已确定了60位潜在的客户。

sentences.sContent: The company certainly has the potential for growth.
sentences.sCn: 那家公司肯定有发展潜力。

sentences.sContent: ...it is still in good condition so far without any mechanical breakdowns or potential problems due to my careful maintenance...
...the report’s writers downplay that potential outcome in that it has not yet occurred...
...What could have been considered the beginning of a descent is now a potential turning point—the turning point you are most equipped to take full advantage of...
...Breakfast has the potential to be very profitable...
...Such distractions have the potential to be disastrous...
...you'd sometimes think that everyone has the potential to be an effective leader...
...We judge a potential partner according to our specific cultural expectations about what romantic love should feel like...
...they also agree that the rapid increase in price is eating up more and more of the potential return...
...They're willing to do the hard work of identifying their valuable skills; be creative about where and how to look; learn how to present themselves to potential employers; and keep going...
...Social workers and experts on aging offer caregivers and potential caregivers help when arranging for the care of an elderly relative...
...If you tell your dim friend that he has the potential of an Einstein...

...So someone leaving university who already has the skills needed to work in an industrial lab has far more potential in the job market than someone who has spent all their time on a narrow research project...
...The agents were able to utilize their full potential and experiences to build up the company...
...Yet it is proposed that some measures should be taken to solve the potential problems caused by it...
...Dale’s assumptions are another example of the well-intentioned but incorrect thinking that limits an organization’s ability to tap into the full potential of a diverse workforce...
...The practical conclusion is that if global warming is a potential disaster...
...This theory explains the potential that human infants have for learning language...

phrases.pCn: [经]市场潜力；市场潜在需求量
潜在价值；位势值；平衡值
[生理学]（大脑皮质的）激发性电位
水势；水潜能；静水压；水位

remMethod.val: po ＋ tent(伸展) ＋ ial → 无限伸展的潜能 → 潜能

trans.tranOther: likely to develop into a particular type of person or thing in the future
the possibility that something will develop in a particular way, or have a particular effect
